application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The Development shall be carried out in accordance with recommendations set out in the approved Basement Impact Assessment.Reason: To prevent the development from increasing the risk of flooding to the site itself or elsewhere, in accordance with policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Details required for Condition 8 (Basement Impact Assessment) of planning permission 21/01585/FUL (Erection of new 3 storey building with basement containing 7no. self-contained residential units with ancillary cycle store and refuse/recycling store (following demolition of existing dwellinghouse))
